description: This course explores topics in European history, designed to emphasize active skills of critical reading, textual and contextual analysis, historiographical argument, and historical writing. Recent topics have included "Restoration Britain" and "France in World War II." Primarily for history majors; others by permission of instructor. Offered most years.
name: Sem: Utopia/Terror
notes: Especially for sophomore history majors, but others may also register.
title: Major Seminar: European History
